name: Trimaze
description: Trimaze is a puzzle game for everybody who loves mazes or labyrinths. It's in development but feel free to leave a comment below about the game. I would like to know what you like about the game and also what you don't like.  Every comment counts. Trimaze is available for android and PC too. You can download it below. If you like this game and you want more follow me on twitter!(Link is in the game's main menu.) Thank you and have fun!
